thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-INDIA FINMIN REPORT: CYCLICAL CONDITIONS MAY LEAD TO LOWER TAX AND NON-TAX REVENUES IN 2017/18

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-INDIA FINMIN REPORT: CYCLICAL CONDITIONS MAY LEAD TO LOWER TAX AND NON-TAX REVENUES IN 2017/18
text:
MUMBAI, Jan 29 (Reuters) - India Fin Min report says:
* ECONOMIC MANAGEMENT WILL BE CHALLENGING IN THE COMING YEAR
* PERSISTENTLY HIGH OIL PRICES REMAIN A KEY RISK, TO AFFECT INFLATION
* CYCLICAL CONDITIONS MAY LEAD TO LOWER TAX AND NON-TAX REVENUES IN 2017/18 (Reporting by New Delhi Newsroom)
